sentences.en: Alcoholic drinks act as a poison to a child.
sentences.cn: 酒精饮料对小孩犹如毒药.

sentences.en: An alcoholic is not allowed to drive.
He showed great courage by admitting on television that he is an alcoholic.
sentences.cn: 他在电视上承认他是个酒鬼，表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.en: He showed great courage by admitting that he is an alcoholic.
sentences.cn: 他以极大的勇气承认自己酗酒。
他并非货真价实的酒鬼。

sentences.en: It is very alcoholic, sometimes near the strength of port.
sentences.cn: 它的酒精浓度很高，有时接近波尔图葡萄酒的浓度。

sentences.en: laws governing the sale of alcoholic beverages
Novello says college students will spend $4.2 billion yearly on alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 诺韦洛说大学生每年在酒精饮品上会消费掉42亿美元。

sentences.en: Prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 禁止出售含酒精的饮料.

sentences.en: regulations governing the sale of alcoholic beverages
sentences.cn: 含酒精饮料的销售管理条例

sentences.en: The alcoholic strength of brandy far exceeds that of wine.
sentences.cn: 白兰地的酒精浓度远远超过葡萄酒.

sentences.en: The guests left in an alcoholic haze.
sentences.cn: 客人们醉醺醺地离去了。

sentences.en: Water precipitates camphor from its alcoholic solution.
sentences.cn: 水能把樟脑从其酒精溶液中淀析出来.

sentences.en: We do not sell any alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 我们不出售含酒精的饮料.

words.tran_cn: 酗酒；[内科] 酒精中毒
醇化；变成酒精；浸渍酒精中

phrases.tran_cn: 酒精提出物，酒精萃取物

trans.tran_en: relating to alcohol or containing alcohol
someone who regularly drinks too much alcohol and has difficulty stopping
